subject: Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: Eager to move on from the Bobby Petrino scandal, Arkansas announced that John L. Smith, a popular former assistant, will return as head football coach on an unusual 10-month contract.
snippet: Eager to move on from the Bobby Petrino scandal, Arkansas announced that John L. Smith, a popular former assistant, will return as head football coach on an unusual 10-month contract.
